TopicTitle: What is the best environmental enhancements?

Articles.Content: In your opinion, what's the best visual enhancement mod?
I've been rather happy with Astronomer's Visual Pack.
If you have a potato computer, Scifi visual enhancements is very good, especially when combined with scatterer.
Barzon Kerman, I do not have a toaster, thanks.
Modding question moved to the modding subforum. Carry on.
Haven't tried any other than SVE, Scatterer and EVE for some reason but they are very good together.
Sci Fi Visual Enhancements. even when my gaming pc arrives, i will continue to use it.
